statements: UPDATE vehicle_sensor_data SET speed = 60 WHERE sensor_id = 1;

UPDATE vehicle_sensor_data SET speed = 80 WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE vehicle_sensor_data SET gps_coordinates = '40.7128° N, 74.0060° W', speed = 60 WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND vehicle_id = 456;
UPDATE VehicleSensorData SET speed = 60 WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE VehicleHistory SET event_description = 'Oil change' WHERE vehicle_id = 2;

UPDATE vehicle_analytics SET total_distance=150.75, average_speed=65.8 WHERE vehicle_id=456;
